76a6('bum): gzugs dang ma skyes pa de gnyi su ma mchis te/ gnyisu bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha drad pa
76a7('bum): ma lags te/ de'i slad du gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de chos ma lags te/ de ltar
76a8('bum): yid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de yid ma lags te/ de ltar
76b1('bum): na ma dadu sa skyes pa da ga kyis sum ches te/ su pagyir mams so// ci'i thang dubyen bcos dulas do 'a sa pa skyes pa ni bcig pa mgrus gnyisas nas rangs zhus
76b2('bum): lags te/ de'i slad du chos kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de chos ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das doni 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de mig gi rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ de ltar dmin
76b3('bum): gi rnam par shes pa dang / ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyi su dgyir ma mchis// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa
76b4('bum): ma lagasate/ de'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de mig gi rnam par shes pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang
76b5('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ de ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / ma skyes pa de gnyisu ma mchis te/ gnyisu bgyir ma
76b6('bum): ma mchis// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dri ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyi su ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang ldan
76b7('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma lags te/ de ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyi su bgyir ma mchis so// 
76b8('bum): deci'i srang dun na/ bcom ldan 'das deni 'di ltar ba skyes pa ni gcig ma 'gas gnyis ma lags/ gamang bam lags/ ba dad pa ma legs te/ do slad du mig gis 'grus 'dus te reg pa'i mi skyes pa gang lags
77a1('bum): byes papa mags pade 'ing gyi 'das te reg pa ma gas te/ degyu na/ yid kyi 'dus ga pa dang / sbyi bdi ses pa chis te su phyi sa 'o// de'i slang drud/ bco ldan das de'i 'di kya
77a2('bum): pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma 'gas/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i maskyes pa gang 'gas pa de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par 'gas so// bcom ldan 'das jig de 'dus
77a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags te/ de ltar na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / ma skyes pa de gnyisu ma mchis te gnyi su bgyir
77a4('bum): ma mchis// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyun gyis tshor ba'i me skyes
77a5('bum): pa gang lags de/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi
77a6('bum): tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags te/ de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te
77a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa
77b1('bum): na'ags te do blang du meng kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye byis tshor ba'i maskyes ba gang ba 'das pade'i kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi sa tshor bas 'das so// bcom ldan das pa'i 'das kyi ma skyes po gang dgas bde
77b2('bum): sa'i khams sa lags te/ de ltar nasa'i khams dang ma skyes pa de gnyi sum mchis te gnyisu bgyir ma mchis// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das deni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags
77b3('bum): mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de sa'i khams dam lagaso// bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams
77b4('bum): dang na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams dang ma skyes pa de gnyisu ma mchis te gnyis bgyi ma mchis// de ci'i slad
77b5('bum): du ni na da bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ba skyes pa ni gcig na lags/ gnyis ma 'gas/ mang ba ma lags/ thed pa'i malags te/ de'i slang du nom par shes pa'i khams kyi sa skyes pa gang 'gas na rdzun par zhes
77b6('bum): po'i khams ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ ma rig pa ma lags te/ de ltar na ma rig pa dang / ma skyes pa de gnyis ma mchis te gnyi su 'gyir ma mchi so// de ci'i slad du
77b7('bum): ni nad bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ma rig pa ma lagaso// 
77b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len po dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa
78a1('bum): den shes gas te/ de mar ngas kyis pade sum te/ ga su she // so drang na/ co sa na 'a rgyu rjes padag dun na
78a2('bum): mA lags / mang bram lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang lags paden shem lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i bskyes pa gang lags pade/ sbyin pa'i ba'o
78a3('bum): du phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / ma skyes pa de gnyisu ma mchis te/ gnyisu bgyir ma mchi so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma logs gnyis ma
78a4('bum): lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa
78a5('bum): dadang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma lags
78a6('bum): te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / ma skyes pa de gnasu ma mchis te/ gnyi su bgyir ma mchis// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'ongs de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang
78a7('bum): bam lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te// de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags// pade
78a8('bum): nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na nang snying po nyid dang / ma skyes po de gnyisu ma mchis te/ gnyi su bgyir ma mchiso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma
78b1('bum): 'gas dang/ ngom pa med pa'ing ba cad rjong byed pa gas te/ de sta na dzum po med pa 'dzi cad stong pa med dang / 'askyes pa ga ma ces te/ gsu kyi 'jig/ de'i sla nan/ na
78b2('bum): de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dang par lags te/ de'i srangad du ngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang lags bde/ dngas po mi pa dzi ba nyid spongs
78b3('bum): nyid ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / ma skyes pa de gnyi su ma mchis te
78b4('bum): gnyi su bgyir ma mchis// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis
78b5('bum): skyes pa gang lags pa de/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan 'ag
78b6('bum): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / ma skyes pa de gnyi su ma man+da
78b7('bum): te gnyis byar ma mchis// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang bar lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
79a1('bum): bar 'dug pa dang / rnam par bar ba dang / thar byis panas pa sgongs par 'jug pa dang / stong med dang / da pa ded pa dang / drod pa da pa dang / man par bres pa dang / ting nge yin dang gdung ni
79a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyim skyes pa gang 'gas ba de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams pasani
79a3('bum): te/ de ltar na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / ma skyes pa de gnyi su mchis te/ gnyis bgyir ma mchi so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma
79a4('bum): lags/ mang ba ma lags ka tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa rnams ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
79a5('bum): nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ de bzhin nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang ma skyes pa de gnyi su ma mchis te gnyi su bgyir ma mchiso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni cig
79a6('bum): malags / gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma 'gas te/ de'i slad du de bzhin nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ de bzhin nyid ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang rjes
79a7('bum): kyi nas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyababa'i dbyings dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma phyir
79b1('bum): 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma 'gas/ mang ba ma lags/ thadad pa ma 'gas te/ de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang 'gas padre/ rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
79b2('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags te/ de ltar na gzugs dang 'grib pa de gnyi sum mchis te gnyi su bgyur ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni rje
79b3('bum): ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
79b4('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyi su ma mchis te gnyisu bgyir ma mchis// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'ad
79b5('bum): do ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rnam bur shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa rnam par shes pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das mig gi
79b6('bum): 'grib pa gang 'gas pa de mig ma lags te/ de ltar na mig dang 'grib pa de gnyi su ma mchis te gnyisu bgyir ma mchis// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lpag sa/ gnyis ma na
79b7('bum): mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du mig gi 'grib pa gang lags pa de mig ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de yid ma lags te/ de ltar
81a1('bum): to de'i slang du ying kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de 'id ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gdugs kyi 'greb pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags te/ de sngar na gzugs dang 'grib pa de gnyi sum mchis te/ gci su byer
81a2('bum): ma mchiso// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lugs pa de gzugs ma
81a3('bum): lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de chos ma lags te/ de ltar na chos dang 'grib pa de gnyi su ma mchis te/ gnyis bgyir ma mchi so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcoM
81a4('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du gzugs chos kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de chos ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam

81a6('bum): ni 'di ltar 'bring ba ni gcig lamaso/ gnyis ma lags/ mang badz+ra gas/ tha dang bra ma lags te/ de'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang legs pa de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ma lag so// bcom
81a7('bum): ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa ru shes pa zeng / srid kyi rnam pa shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dra
81b1('bum): te/ de lta med bye ma par shes pa dang 'brib pa de ga nyis pa ramanyen nyisu babyemam mad tsho drad du de na/ bam ldan 'das de ni 'di byar 'breb ba ni ga sasu ma lags gnyis pa nas/ 'du
81b2('bum): lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni meg
81b3('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma lags te/ de ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / 'grib pa de gnyi su ma mchis te gnyi su bgyir ma mchiso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags

81b5('bum): pA dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags te/ de ltar na yid kyi 'as
81b6('bum): de reg pa dang / drigrI pa pa de gnyisu chi te gnyisu 'gyur ba mchis// de ci'i srid du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dri ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis mu lags spang ba ma lags/ badrad pa ma rigs te/ 
81b7('bum): du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lag so// 6bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang lags bapade/ mig gi 'dus te reg

82a1('bum): sa / sa// / rgyu gyu / rlung du sa na tu na chu bar 'gru 'du rgyu byung
82a2('bum): reg pa'i byin gyis rkyor bam lagaso// bcom ldan 'das na pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi ma tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bdang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang gro 'du

82a6('bum): sa'i khams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ 
82a7('bum): tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de sa'i khams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i kham
82a8('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// 
82b1('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang lags
82b2('bum): pade rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ma rig pa ma lags te/ de ltar na ma rig pa dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis
82b3('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags// mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ dri'i slad du ma rig pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa dam rig pa
82b4('bum): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / regra pa dang / tshor ba dang / smad pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'i 'bru

82b6('bum): ma lags// mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du na shi'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de na zhi ma lags so// 
82b7('bum): / bcom ldan 'das spyan du nga rol du phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de sbyin pa'i
82b8('bum): rom du byin par 'gas te/ dkur ngamun par b.ros du byin pa dang 'bra' ba dganyisum ma chis te gnyisug 'gyir mamachim sa// da ci'i sradang du 'oni bcom ldan 'das den 'di mir 'brib
83a1('bum): ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pam lags te// de'i srang du sbyin pa'i ro du phyin pa'i 'grob pa gang lags 'de sbyin pa'i rom du sbyin pa ma las
83a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

83a4('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags to// de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma lag
83a5('bum): sobacom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang 'gri bo pade gnyi su ma mchis te gnyi sug bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du
83a6('bum): zhen bsod ldan 'das deni 'di gyur 'grub pa ni gci par 'gas/ gnyis ma lags/ rang ngas lag/ thadang pa ma 'grus te/ de srang dunang stod pa nyid kyi 'gro'i pa gang 'gas nga spong ba'i pa
83a7('bum): bcom ldan das dngas po ri dang dzi bo cad byung ming kyi bar gyi 'grub pa gang lags pa de dngos po med pa'i nga tha cad snang ba'id ma rigs te/ de ltar na dngos po mdang 'ar ba cid stong bcid
83a8('bum): 'brib bdag yum pa ma te gnyis su dbyor mamachims/ dotso'i drang du da na/ bcod ldan 'das 'bur 'grib pa ni gcig ma 'das gnyis ma 'gas mang ba ma lags yang
83b1('bum): dam panas te/ nga ma dang ma rlo kyi 'grub pa gang lags pa ngos 'ja pa rjod kyi sa gas so// dun nga
83b2('bum): 'grib pa gang lags pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyi su ma mchis te gnyisu bgyir ma mchis so// do tsar slad du zhe na/ btso
83b3('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ gnyis ma ra lags/ mang ba ma lags/ tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag

83b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma lags te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis

83b7('bum): lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang 'gas pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan 'ag brgyad pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bas mu gtan dang / chang meng po dang / gzugs med pa'i
83b8('bum): sboms par 'jug pa dang / rngam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / 
84a1('bum): gdungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spongs bcu dang / ni 'jigs pa dang / so so'ang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dus pa 'jo brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang 'gas ra
84a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom

84a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te/

84a7('bum): gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis ma mchis shing mnyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par bya
84a8('bum): ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyi su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang yang mig ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyisu ma mchis shing nyam mi pa ma mchis pa'i
84b1('bum): gdug seshes pa byed 'dini ga nyis sum mtsha gang ldan pa ma mchis pa'i tshas kyinam grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang ba dang / khwa dang / ro dang ras dang / chos shes kying 'don ma nyis su

84b7('bum): gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bgyi

85a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyi su ma mchis shing banyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang yang nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni
85a7('bum): gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis
85a8('bum): pa'o// gang yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa' zhes bgyi ba'i
85b1('bum): bar 'di ni gnyis sum mchis shing nyam pam mchis pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su 'gyis pa'o// gang 'angasangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rjo brgya ses bgyi ba'i bar 'din gnyis su mchis shing rnam pa ma gyis pa
85b2('bum): chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bgyi ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bgyis pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus
85b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar yongs su rtog
85b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gang yongs su rtag pa ni gang / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ta'i bu la 'di skad
85b5('bum): ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' gang zhes zer ba ni/ gang gi phyir/ sems can byang chub yin pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// byang chub des kyang chos
85b6('bum): thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la mngon par chags pa med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / te/ chos gang gi rnam pa shes she na/ gzugs kyi rnam pa shes de de la mngon par chags pa med do// tshor ba dang
85b7('bum): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes pa te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do/ 
85b8('bum): pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad
86a1('bum): ra dang / rdus se sa pa chun padang / ma da / kya ma par chun pa yong sed dang / na da dang / du
86a2('bum): ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi rnam shes te/ de la mngon par
86a3('bum): chags pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa ni gang yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis chos rnams rnam pa yod
86a4('bum): bar bya ste/ 'di ltar 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gzugs sam/ sgra 'am dri 'am ro 'am/ rig phyi nang gi chos kyang shes te/ rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis rnam pa yod par bya ba'i
86a5('bum): dag ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha re da ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha dwa ti'i bu gang la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di
86a6('bum): ni ring du song ba ste// ci'i phyir ring du song zhes bya ba zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha re da ti'i bu phung po rnams las ring du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams las ring du song bas na de'i phyir
86a7('bum): ring du song ba zhes bya'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / 'gro ba drag las ring du ra song bas na / de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa las ring du song bas na
86a8('bum): de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
86b1('bum): lab 'di du myong bas na/ de byur nga du spong sa bya'o// nang spong byed las nga du song bas na/ de spyor ma song bzhes // thong pa'i gas nga du song bas na/ don ci naslong
86b2('bum): phyi nang spong pa nyid las ring du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid kyi bar las ring dur song bas na/ de phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
86b3('bum): rnams las ring du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 
86b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa sgom
86b5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang gting
86b6('bum): nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams las ring du song bas na// de'i phyir ring dur song ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
86b7('bum): rnams drang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las ring du song bas ni/ de'i phyir ring du song bris na zhes bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song duni
86b8('bum): bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dadwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni ring du song ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra da nga'i bu gang yang 'di skad du yongs su brtag pa gang nas be na
87a1('bum): ga tshe dang ldan pa shar da nga'i bu 'dil byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mirta gces bya bar mong su ma rtog go// bde nas
87a2('bum): bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yong su mi rtog go// bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya

91b5('bum): rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// bdag ces
91b6('bum): bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// mtshan ma
91b7('bum): yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang yongs su mi rtog go// zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su ma rtog
91b8('bum): go/ dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go// 'di lta ste tshe dang ldan pa sha da ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
92a1('bum): chos 'di dag la yongs su rtog pa med pa'i tshul gyis de ltar yongs su rtog go// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs
92a2('bum): ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i ci re zhe na/ de skad du skye mched dang
92a3('bum): khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sums cad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
92a4('bum): rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar
92a5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang
92a6('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas na kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dad kyi bar du ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa
92a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan
92a8('bum): pa sha ra ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha rang ti'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang // rnam par shes pa
92b1('bum): nirnam par shes pas spong ste/ gang stong ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des nu/ rnam bur shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang min pade rnam par shes pa
92b2('bum): ma yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin te
92b3('bum): skye ba med do/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin
92b4('bum): bo'i pha rol du phyin pa ni sbyin pa ni pha rol du phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sbyin po'i pha ro
92b5('bum): du phyin pa'i mi skyes pa gang yin pa de sbyin po'i pha rol du phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha rod ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson
92b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du
92b7('bum): phyin pa ma yin te/ skye bo med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha rang
92b8('bum): ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin to skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de na
93a1('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar da ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ bye stong pa nyid ni byi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa don gyi stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan
93a2('bum): bshar da ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyim skyes pa gang yin pa'i phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shAr ti'i bu phye nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong ba rjen
93a3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes ma pa gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
93a4('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha
93a5('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo mo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu dran pa nye bar
93a6('bum): gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dran pa nye bar
93a7('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams
93a8('bum): dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
93b1('bum): brgyad pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra da bu rnam grangs des na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// 
93b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i
93b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo
93b4('bum): rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
93b5('bum): rnams ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no
93b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// 
93b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na
93b8('bum): de skad du gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ 
94a1('bum): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu
94a2('bum): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis
94a3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ti nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin
94a4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
94a5('bum): rnams ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
94a6('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
94a7('bum): rnam par shes pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa ltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar
94a8('bum): mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i
94b1('bum): pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa// thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// 'grib pa
94b2('bum): gang yin pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi tshogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa de rnams dang
94b3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
94b4('bum): dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang
94b5('bum): dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thaMd
94b6('bum): kyang ldan pa ma yin/ mi ldan pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ rdzogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
94b7('bum): des na/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de 'di gzugs ma yin tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa de gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ skye mched
94b8('bum): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ma yin/ pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi
95a1('bum): phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / chang med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'dun pa rnams dang / ma
95a2('bum): par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
95a3('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
95a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de
95a5('bum): ci'i phyir na/ de skad du gang 'di gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis
95a6('bum): su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang de skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyog
95a7('bum): kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha
95a8('bum): pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ma smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
95b1('bum): rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgornams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pasgra
95b2('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa
95b3('bum): zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang ma
95b4('bum): skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'dri gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
95b5('bum): rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
95b6('bum): des na/ gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar skye mched dang / khams dang / rton cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams
95b7('bum): dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa
95b8('bum): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba rnams dong / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang man
96a1('bum): par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thobs rnams dang / 'dugs pa rnams dang / soso sa das brdzun
96a2('bum): pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams de/ sangs rgyas kyi
96a3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 
96a4('bum): 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
96a5('bum): kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi grangs su byas pa'o// de nas tshe dang
96a6('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
96a7('bum): cing chos de dag la de ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
96a8('bum): byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du skye mchod dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur
96b1('bum): shin du nam par dag pa'i srad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin
96b2('bum): ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mi skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 
96b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma na skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin du rnam par dag
96b4('bum): pa'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po
96b5('bum): rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du 'phags pa'i
96b6('bum): bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i skams par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyom
96b7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sku
96b8('bum): rnams dang rtade bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi ma skyes
97a1('bum): pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i srad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du so sa
97a2('bum): skye bo'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i
97a3('bum): slad durta lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnamasapa/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / 
97a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / rA sangs rgyas dang rnams chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin du
97a5('bum): rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan
97a6('bum): pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don bdag gis shes pa ltar ni gzugs kyang ma skyes la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes/ skye mched rnams kyang ma
97a7('bum): skyes/ khams rnams kyang ma skyes/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams kyang ma skyes/ pha rol du phyin pa rnams kyang ma skyes/ stong pa nyid thams cad kyang mo skyes/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
97a8('bum): chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang ma skyes/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gautan rnams dang // med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par
97b1('bum): thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / 
97b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / kyang ma skyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
97b3('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang ma skyes// so so'i skye bo yang ma skyes// so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang ma skyes// rgyun du zhugs pa yang ma
97b4('bum): skyes rnga rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang ma skyes/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang ma skyes/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes/ phyir mi 'ong ba yang ma skyes/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma
97b5('bum): skyes te dgra bcom pa yang ma skyes/ dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang ma skyes/ rang sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes/ byang chub sems dpa' yang ma skyes/ byang chub
97b6('bum): sems dpa'i chos kyang ma skyes// sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te/ gzugs ma skyes kyang skye ba med/ sangs
97b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang skye ba med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang skye ba med// so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang skye ba med/ 
97b8('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyang skye ba med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye bo med// phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
98a1('bum): chos kyang skye ba med/ dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang skye ba med// sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' ya skye
98a2('bum): ba med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang skye ba med/ sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang
98a3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
98a4('bum): tho ba zin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba lnga rnams kyang tha ma dad par 'gyur ro// 
98a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang byang chub rnam pa lnga thob zin par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad ma skyes pa yin na// ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pas ni
98a6('bum): sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/ lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug dang bsrabs pa'i phyir lam bsgoms/ phyir mi 'ong bas ni dam pa ma yin pa'i cha can
98a7('bum): gyi kun du sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/ dgra bcom pas ni bla ma'i cha can gyi kun du sbyor ba rnam pa lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pas ni rang byang chub
98a8('bum): kyi don du'i ma bsgoms gci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can rnams kyi don du de ltar sdug bsngol nyams su 'ong bar byed cing dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod na ci'i phyir de bzhin
98b1('bum): rab rgya / ming rdzun pashA da bu 'din ces smras so// nga pa bar du'i drung dag masas smras dul bya ba nga nga nga drung da
98b2('bum): bal rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mi 'dod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do// ma skyes pa la lan cig phyir 'ong bar yod par mi 'dod do// len cog phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu man
98b3('bum): par mi 'dod do// ma skyes pa la phyir mi ldog 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do// ma skyes pa la dgra bcom pa yod par mi 'dod do// dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya ba
98b4('bum): yod par mi 'dod do// ma skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do// rang byang chub yod par mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba'i
98b5('bum): spyad pa spyod par yod pa mi 'dod de// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dka' ba spyod pa'i 'du shes kyis mi spyod de/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni sdug bsngal gyi 'du she
98b6('bum): bskyed na/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don du bya ba de yang mi nus kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can rnams la mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / par 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes
98b7('bum): bskyed pa dang dbur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bu mo 'du shes bskyed pas/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i ngor bya ba de yang mi dmigs po'i tshul du gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems pas
99a1('bum): sems dpa chen pon 'a gyu sems paskyed de/ ma dag padas sa bya bsang ngo ma dadu thams sa ma sa rnas pa sa bye shA
99a2('bum): du byi nang gi chos rnams la yang 'du shes bskyed de/ de ltar 'du shes bskyed kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes mi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni chos gang yang mi len mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 
99a3('bum): rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni ma skyes pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod par 'dod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'dod do// 
99a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar na/ ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa'am/ 'thob par bya ba med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod skyes pa'i chos 'thob par 'dod
99a5('bum): dmarta 'on tam ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob par 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do// ma skyes pa'i chos kyis
99a6('bum): kyang 'thob par mi 'dod do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'o na thob pa med na mngon par rtogs pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'o na thob pa yang yod/ mngon
99a7('bum): par rtogs pa yang yod de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gnyis kyis ma yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thob pa'am mngon par rtogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o// 
99a8('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gangag
99b1('bum): dmas pa pa sa gas la// rgyun ga la rgyu / thA la d+hA ma
99b2('bum): 'am sangs rgyas su 'dags pa med do// smras pa medang ldan parab 'byor tho ba dang mngon pa rtogs par bya ba 'jig rten gyi tha byung du yang ba de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jog rter gyi tha skad du
99b3('bum): dad kyi don dam par ma yin nam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA rad ti'i de de bzhin te/ ji ltar thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'dzin
99b4('bum): rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa ron las kyang med las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med// skye ba yang med/ 'gag
99b5('bum): ba yang med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/ rnam par byang ba yang med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur ram/ 'on tam skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur
99b6('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni ma skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod/ skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod do// 
99b7('bum): shes rab bam go// // smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i
99b8('bum): chos skye bar mi 'dod ba gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shar da ti'i bu bdag ni gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin pan gyis spong ba skye bar mi 'dod do// mi dang ldan pa shar da ti'i bus
100a1('bum): rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang
100a2('bum): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang
100a3('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
100a4('bum): stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa
100a5('bum): ti'i bu bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod pa gang yin/ smras pa
100a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
100a7('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag ni skye mched dang / khams dang // rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa
100b1('bum): sa dang / @ma da / sa nga / sa na swA / da skyed nas / na @
100b2('bum): pa rnams dang / rnam par bar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa meng pa dang / 
100b3('bum): par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sang
100b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod
100b5('bum): do smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor skye ba skye 'am/ 'on tam mi skye ba skye/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba yang mi skye mi skye ba yang mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
100b6('bum): 'di ltar skye ba gang yin pa dang / skyo ba med pa gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs mod pa/ balhor med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid
100b7('bum): med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar rnam grangs nges na/ skye ba yang mi skye/ mi skye ba yang mi skye bo// shar da ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i ma
100b8('bum): ma skyes pa'i chos shes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba mod pa la gang brjod du spobs par 'gyur ro/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ljon pa shar
101a1('bum): gis slobs pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa shar da ti'i bu chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skyo ba med pa yang bdag gis brjod par spobs pa med do// de ci'i phyir na na/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dado bu 'di ltar ma skyes
101a2('bum): pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa ma yin ldan pa mngam
101a3('bum): yin// gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa dag go// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor brjod pa ni skye ba med ces bya ba
101a4('bum): yin te/ spobs pa yang skye ba med la/ chos kyang ma skyes pa ste/ gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shar
101a5('bum): dati'i bu de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni ma skyes pa'o// spobs pa ni ma skyes pa'o// chos ni ma skyes pa'o// gang las bsams te smra bar spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang ma skyes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
101a6('bum): shar dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar gzugs skyo ba med do// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med do// mig skye ba med do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lde dang / lus dang / 
101a7('bum): ming skye ba med do// gzugs skye ba med do// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos skye ba med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa skye bo med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par
101b1('bum): rnam pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sras kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyirnam par shes pa rtse ba ma nga/ ma 'as ga skyed do// ban pa'i 'dus ga pa dang / 'i
101b2('bum): reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / skye ba med do// mig gi'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba med do// rna ba'i 'dus te
101b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te/ 
101b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba skye ba med do// sa'i khams skye ba med do// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams skye ba med de/ 
101b5('bum): ma rig pa skye ba med do// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / rig pa dang / tshor ba dang / skyed pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skyo ba dang / 
101b6('bum): shi skye ba med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa skye ba med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin po dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
101b7('bum): pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa skye ba med do// nang stong pa nyid skye ba med do// phyi stong pa nyid skyo ba med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid skye ba med do// dngos po med pa'i
101b8('bum): zo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skye ba med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
102a1('bum): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye ba med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / rlu
102a2('bum): med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar
102a3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
102a4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
102a5('bum): rnam grangs des na brjod pa ni skye ba med pa ste/ spobs pa yang skye ba med la/ chos kyang skye ba med de/ gang las brtsams shing / brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med
102a6('bum): ba'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba'i nang na/ mchog tu bya bar 'os pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongs su dris
102a7('bum): pa de dang de la thogs pa med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chos thams cad la gnas pa med pa dag gi chos nyid de
102a8('bum): de dag ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de la thogs pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
102b1('bum): der nga/ chos byams cad myong ba nyid mi gnas pa yid/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pashar ti bu/ gzugs ni rang bzhin kyis spong ba ste/ den
102b2('bum): mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin
102b3('bum): gyis stong pa ste/ mig gi rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig ni
102b4('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang na sa mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba dang / sna dang
102b5('bum): lce dang / lus dang / yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
102b6('bum): gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sgra dang / dri dang
102b7('bum): ro dang / reg dang / chos ni rang bzhin gyis spong ba ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa ti'i bu mig ni
102b8('bum): rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas// phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
103a1('bum): dang / lnga'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ba ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas
103a2('bum): rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na
103a3('bum): yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi
103a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang
103a5('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi
103a6('bum): dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang
103a7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis
103a8('bum): ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis spong ba ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par
103b1('bum): ma rigs pa// med nga ldan pa sharang byu / chub khams dang / me khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / rnam las khams dang / rnam par shes par khams na
103b2('bum): spong ba ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas / phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par ma yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu ma rig pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste
103b3('bum): de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / 
103b4('bum): skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi
103b5('bum): rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ 
103b6('bum): phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / 
103b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gonas/ phyi
103b8('bum): rol na yang mi gnas/ gaunyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas// 
104a1('bum): phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis
104a2('bum): stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhi
104a3('bum): gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi ga dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / 
104a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang
104a5('bum): na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / 
104a6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
104a7('bum): dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzugs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnam
104a8('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas
104b1('bum): gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra ti'i bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ba ste/ de ni nang na yang myi gnas
104b2('bum): phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid
104b3('bum): kyi phyir mi gnas pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pas/ de ltar gzugs yongs su byang bar bya'o/ 
104b4('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su byang bar bya'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su skye bar bya'o/ 
104b5('bum): pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang
104b6('bum): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / 
104b7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang
104b8('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su byang bar bya'o// 
104'a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dadwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 
104'a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe
104'a3('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni 'jig pa yang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
104'a4('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'jig rten Na ba yang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab
104'a5('bum): 'byor 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni gang / 'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dadwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
104'a6('bum): dpa' chen po sbyin pa byed cing sbyin bdag tu gyur pa dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / 'phongs pa dang / lcogs pa dang / 'dron pa dang / slong ba zas 'dod pa la ni zas/ skom dang / theg
104'a7('bum): pa dang / gos dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gnas dang / mal stan dang / yo byad dang / sman dang / mi'i yo byad gzhan ci yang rung ba'i bar
104'a8('bum): du yongs su gtong ste/ bu po 'dod pa la ni bu 'o// yongs su gtong / bu mo 'dod pa la ni bu mo// chung ma 'dod pa la ni chung ma/ rgyal srid 'dod pa la ni rgyal srid/ 'gro
104'b1('bum): na/ nga du sa su du kA k+Sha / klu ku ng+gA/ zlu sa
104'b2('bum): deyang gnas shing mangs su gtong la/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni yongs su gtong ba// don len pa'o// 'dod po sbyin par// bdag ni sor ma med bang // bang gi'i rgyu
104'b3('bum): bdag pa'o// sa bdag ni gdag pa thams cad 'angs su gtong ba'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o// bdag ni sbyin pa'i ba rib du byin pa la spyod du'o
104'b4('bum): te sbyin pa de byin nas kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang // thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo rnye / bangag
104'b5('bum): gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag/ tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang / nye bar 'alen pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo ste/ 
104'b6('bum): chags pa gsum la chags shing sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ngo // gsum gang zhe na// 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / sbyin par 'du shes pa
104'b7('bum): 'di gsum la chags nas sbyin pa de yongs su gdong ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rim du phyin pa zhes byar// de'i phyir 'jig rten par pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya zhen
104'b8('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi gso ma 'jig mi 'da' bas/ de'i phyir na 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten las 'ongs pa'i skyon
105a1('bum): pa rob du phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su drug pa skye/ de la 'khor gsus yongs su dag pa steg zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa na
105a2('bum): ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa pha rol du gtong ba'i tshe/ bdag mi dmigs/ len pa mi dmigs/ sbyin pa mi dmigs
105a3('bum): de'i rnam par sbyin pa la yang dga' bar mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
105a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / sbyin pa de sems can thams cad la gtong ste/ sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs par/ bla na med pa yang dag
105a5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing / mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dzag rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha
105a6('bum): rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i sra pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya zhe nu/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phag la 'da'
105a7('bum): bas de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
105a8('bum): pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/ 
105b1('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod de/ de la 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gang zhe na// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
105b2('bum): dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung zhing de yang gnas pas srung ste/ 'di snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du/ tshul khrims srung ngo // 'di ni tshul khrims
105b3('bum): so/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed do// zhes bya ba nas don 'di ltar/ bdag tu 'du shes pa dang gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / nul
105b4('bum): khrims su 'du shes pa dang / chags pa 'di'i gsum zhes bya ba'i bar la chags shing / tshul khrims srung ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
105b5('bum): du phyin pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya zhe ni/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo 'phag mi
105b6('bum): 'di' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'khor gsum
105b7('bum): yongs su dag pa ste/ rol 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
105b8('bum): khrims srung ba'i tshe bdag mi dmigs sems can mi dmigs tshul khrims mo dmigs/ rnam par smin pa la yang dga' bar mi byed cing tshul
106a1('bum): khrims de yang sems can thams cad la gtong ste/ sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs/ par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
106a2('bum): bsngo zhing / mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ste/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las
106a3('bum): g.yo zhing 'phag la 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
106a4('bum): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa sgom zhing / de yang gnas pas sgom ste/ de 'di snyam du bdog ni sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa
106a5('bum): sgom mo 'di ni bzod pa'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o// zhes bya ba nas/ de ni 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang
106a6('bum): bzod par 'du shes pa dang / chags pa 'di gsum zhes bya ba'i bar la chags shing bzod pa sgom ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// de ci
106a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten pa las mi g.yo mi 'phag mi 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa'i pha
106a8('bum): rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/ de la 'khor gsum yongs su
106b1('bum): dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/ bdag mi dmigs/ sems can mi dmigs
106b2('bum): bzod pa mi dmigs rnam par smin pa la yang dga' bar mi byed cing / bzod pa de yang sems can thams cad la gtong ste/ sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs par
106b3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing / mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa'i
106b4('bum): pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ste/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phag la 'da' bas de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus
106b5('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom cing de yang gnas pas tsam ste/ de 'ad
106b6('bum): snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus rtsom mo// 'di ni lus so// 'di ni sems so// 'di ni brtson 'grus so// bdag ni sangs rgyas
106b7('bum): kye bka' bzhin byed do// zhes bya ba nas/ de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / brtson 'grus su 'du shes pa dang / chags pa 'di gsu
108a1('bum): zhes bya ba'i bar la chags shing // brtson 'grus bcom ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig
108a2('bum): rten pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo mi 'phag mi 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig lngas
108a3('bum): 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhi gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/ de la 'khor gsum yongs su gang dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
108a4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/ bdag mi dmigs/ sems can mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus mi dmigs/ rnam
108a5('bum): rnam par smin pa la yang dga' bar mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang sems can thams cad la gtong ste/ sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs par bla na med pa yang dag par
108a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// de ni 'di ltar
108a7('bum): 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phag la 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
108a8('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug cing / de yang gnas pas snyoms par 'jug s+ho/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni sems
